body_html: One thing to note is that you can get different values depending on implementation details, which is not good when reporting numbers in papers. Here is yet another implementation, which I based it off scikit-image's compare_ssim implementation (and the numbers match): https://gist.github.com/alexlee-gk/cbc9bfa6e5be51b53c622684cec0a3f3

body: One thing to note is that you can get different values depending on implementation details, which is not good when reporting numbers in papers. Here is yet another implementation, which I based it off scikit-image's compare_ssim implementation (and the numbers match): https://gist.github.com/alexlee-gk/cbc9bfa6e5be51b53c622684cec0a3f3
